articles.title: IT job cuts in February 2023: The numbers and more - Gadgets Now
articles.description: The bloodbath in the jobs market continues in February 2023 as well. The shortest month of the year 2023 has seen US-based employers announce 77,770 job cuts, according to a report released from global outplacement company Challenger, Gray & Christmas Inc. Te…
articles.content: Technology companies have so far announced the most number of job cuts. Right now, the overwhelming bulk of cuts are occurring in Technology. Retail and Financial are also cutting right now, as consu… [+441 chars]

articles.title: YES Bank stock: Is price correction enticing enough for D-Street investors? - Economic Times
articles.description: While the 3-year lock-in expiry paves the way for lenders such as State Bank of India, and many others to offload stake in YES Bank, reports said that the stakeholders dont plan to do so immediately, and would rather do it in phases.

articles.title: LIC's debt exposure to Adani Group at Rs 6,183 cr, down marginally from Dec: FM Sitharaman - The Economic Times
articles.description: Sitharaman said the LIC's debt exposure to Adani stands at Rs 6,183 crore as of March 5. Of the total value, Adani Ports contributed Rs 5,388 crore and exposure to Adani Power (Mundra) stood at Rs 266 crore.
